amendment.description: To transfer jurisdiction over organization and management of United States nuclear export policy to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4040 withdrawn in Senate.
Senate vitiated previous adoption of Amendment SA 4040.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4040 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4040 proposed by Senator Bingaman for Senator Domenici to Amendment SA 3981. (consideration: CR S10669; text: CR S10669) To transfer jurisdiction over organization and management of United States nuclear export policy to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4040 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4040 proposed by Senator Bingaman for Senator Domenici to Amendment SA 3981.
